ResourceHeader.Description: The Thermal Electron Energy Distribution (TED) experiment measures 0-5 eV electrons in 32 energy steps. The experiment outputs numbers which are the second harmonic of electron flux incident on the TED probe, from these the energy distribution in units of 1/(eV cm**3) may be computed. Data are available from DARTS as plots and digital binary data in the Akebono database. See http://www.darts.isas.jaxa.jp/akbn/readme/readme.ted.txt and Abe et al, J. Geomag. Geoelect., 42, 537-554, 1990, for further details.
